title: My First Post
description: This is a sample blog post created with Contentlayer and MDX.
author: Saqib Sohail

body.raw:
# Welcome to My Blog

This is the **first post** in my new blog powered by Contentlayer and MDX!

- Write posts in Markdown or MDX
- Enjoy code highlighting, images, and more

```js
console.log('Hello, Contentlayer!');
```

Happy blogging!
